text:
1. Add HTTP Proxy Server to you WorkBench (leave all default settings)
2. Add Recording Controller to your WorkBench
3. Start HTTP Proxy Server
4. Disable Recording Controller
5. Open your browser (should be configured to work with HTTP Proxy Server) and 
go to any website.

JMeter will close. No special information i log.
creator: elephant@epf.pl

text:
I can't reproduce it either. But it started to saving request outside recording
controller, same as described in
http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=41721
creator: elephant@epf.pl
